summary: REQ-24 (Upload Lesson) appears implemented on the frontend via a new upload utility and additions to LessonPlansTab. Role-based access updates for Educator/Parent vs Student appear partially addressed in the Dashboard/LessonPlansTab interface, but backend-side authorization/error-string updates for lesson-plan creation are not evidenced in the provided diff. The diff also includes app publish/unpublish (maintenance mode) functionality that is not part of this BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Improve any backend trap/error strings surfaced to end users for lesson-plan creation so they do not misleadingly say “teachers only” when permission is tied to Educator/Parent (admin).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows backend/main.mo changes, but the provided snippet contains publish/unpublish authorization strings and does not show any lesson-plan creation authorization checks or error/trap strings being updated. Since the file is truncated, this cannot be confirmed implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend-controlled publish/unpublish (maintenance mode) endpoints and related frontend query/mutation hooks (publication status gating/admin publish controls).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-23/24/25 (the BuildRequest is scoped to lesson plan creation access and upload). The diff shows new/modified code around publication status and admin-only publish/unpublish actions.
